message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product, but I am only able to offer $15000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to make a counteroffer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $16500. It's a fair compromise, considering the value I've put into the product. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. While I understand the value you place on the product, I am still unable to meet you at $16500. I would like to propose $16000 as my final offer. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, thank you for your latest offer. I understand that you're trying to find a mutually beneficial price, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $16000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $17000. It's the best I can do, considering the value I've put into the product. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your latest proposal. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but unfortunately, I am still unable to meet you at $17000. I would like to make one last offer of $16500. This is my final offer, and I hope it will be acceptable to you.
